mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vector_document (rag_id, text, embedding, metadata, chunk_index) VALUES (#{ragId}, #{content}, #{embedding,typeHandler=com.example.ddd.infrastructure.dao.typehandler.VectorTypeHandler}::vector, #{metadata}::jsonb, #{chunkIndex}) RETURNING embedding_id, rag_id, text, embedding, metadata, chunk_index, created_at, updated_at

(#{doc.ragId}, #{doc.content}, #{doc.embedding,typeHandler=com.example.ddd.infrastructure.dao.typehandler.VectorTypeHandler}::vector, #{doc.metadata}::jsonb, #{doc.chunkIndex})
